GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.86
GSD.description:
RISC-V: Align the shadow stack

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.86 by commit e8985caf05891b943980ce9899ca58782fdd60c3, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 31da94c25aea835ceac00575a9fd206c5a833fed. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:
RISC-V: Align the shadow stack

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.86 by commit e8985caf05891b943980ce9899ca58782fdd60c3, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 31da94c25aea835ceac00575a9fd206c5a833fed. For more details please see the references link.
